column2: A Gross Cat with its feral side unleashed.
column3: Strikes enemies at distance with long, mighty legs.
column4: Costs a bit extra to recruit to fight for you. (Area Atk.)

column2: Its feral side has completely overwhelmed it.
column3: Takes pride in the attack range of his long legs.
column4: Single enemy attacks have exceptional power and range.
